page.title: 14WROCKWARDINE CHURCH
page.content: The Church at Wrockwardine is typical of many that are around the County. The way of life that used to centre around the Church is rapidly passing, and it is in village communites like Wrockwardine that the Church remains at the centre of the community. One of the problems is the upkeep of the church, with its decline in use and for the past few years the village have been having various fund-raising events to raise enough money to repair the steeple. The barometer on the side shows how much money has been raised in order to do these repairs
